markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">[Interstellar Void](/Spells.aspx?ID=756)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=27" />
<trait label="Cursebound" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=320" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 232 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Mystery**
[Cosmos](/Mysteries.aspx?ID=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** Fortitude

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You call upon the frigid depths of outer space to bring a terrible chill to your enemy. The target is cloaked in the freezing void, which deals 3d6 cold damage immediately and the first time each round you Sustain the Spell on future turns, with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save. The target is [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) for as long as the effect persists.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The cold damage increases by 1d6.
name: Interstellar Void

text: Interstellar Void Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 232 2.0 Mystery Cosmos Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 30 feet Target 1 creature Saving Throw Fortitude Duration sustained up to 1 minute --- You call upon the frigid depths of outer space to bring a terrible chill to your enemy. The target is cloaked in the freezing void, which deals 3d6 cold damage immediately and the first time each round you Sustain the Spell on future turns, with a basic Fortitude save. The target is fatigued for as long as the effect persists. --- Heightened (+1) The cold damage increases by 1d6.
